All the fine joys and all the customs, too
And even if there was no dream or laughing
By your side I would always know what I would want. And the wind blows, and the wind blows
And the wind blows, let it just blow

Pape jon je gradi brode bi je meštar o' zanata

Nisu brodi nasrid luke vengo ćer, krasota je'na.. Njene oči, pune vire, caklile se ka o' zlata,
Jubila me priko mire ćer o' stareg kalafata.
Ču san srce di jon kuca poput finog, skupog sata;

Letile su u vis kape, ma nesrića sve prikinu.
Puknila je cima broda, ošinula je nevistu
Ka' kad satu pukne korda, osta ležat tu na mistu.. Njene oči pune vire izlile su sjaj svog zlata,
Jubila me priko mire ćer o' stareg kalafata.
Srce više joj ne kuca, moje tuče poput mlata;
Kad se sitin blizu guca ćeri stareg kalafata

Lyrics_lyricstranslate:
Ovo van je štorija o Nadalini. More bit da vi znate Nadalinu, ha? A ha, sva puca od lipote! A jema je da van pravo rečen ča i vidit, smantala bi ona i većega muškardina di neće ovakega karonju ka ča san ja, a najškole kad pere noge u dvoru, ajme!!
1. Kad Nadalina noge toča, srid dvora u maštilu,
Jo ke beleca ke finoča, inšempja mladost cilu.
Svi gledadu u noge bile, uz bačve karatile,
Jer slaje je od zrilog voća, kad Nadalina noge toča.. Nadalina, Nadalina, da si moja Nadalina,
Jemala bi muškardina, Nadalina, Nadalina.. Joj da mi je onoga slatkoga od fešte; rožade, galetine, mandulati, torte, krokanti - Ni ništa slaje od slatkoga, more bit da je samo slaja Nadalina. Cili dvor zamiriši i poludi kad ona pravi slatko, ajme!!. Kad Nadalina misi slatko, u dane ispred fešte,
Jo da je vidin bar na kratko, ča skriva ispod vešte.
Jer slatka je ka cukar fini, dok leti po kužini,
I rado bi je jemo svatko, kad Nadalina misi slatko.. Jaja se to cili svit zna moredu na milijun mali način sprajat, i u šorbuli i na joko, sirova, more ih se i u tvrdo i u meko i u gusto i u ritko, i sa svon mogućon spizon mutit, al' kad Nadalina muti jaja ka i špatije, to vam je prava fešta od jaji, ajme!!. Kad Nadalina muti jaja, zamuti pamet svima,
I svakim danom ostane slaja, ko gucaj dobrog vina.
Na sebi jema sve nalige, iz ćaćine butige,
I svi je želu bez rataja, kad Nadalina muti jaja.. E vaja poć leć, finila je ova. Al kad Nadalina gre leć, to parika da cvit počiva u cviću, ma da mi je koji put vidit kako se ona uvučuje u posteju, kako ona sva miriše. Noć zasvitli, cvrčki počnu pismu: Nadalina, Nadalina.... Kad Nadalina gasi sviću, kraj otvorenih škura,
Jer lito je i sve je u cviću, al malo noćni ura.

EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
When the last ray of sunlight
Goes weary behind Marjan1
Through the Cross street downtown
The lamplighter goes to the boardwalk. He carries ladders on his back
So he can light the lanterns
Old yellow shoes clack
That once shined for the dance. Easy, in a soft voice
He sings about a man from an island
He finished his work
Boardwalk shined
It lit up all of it
In a thousand colors
Like the youth that passed
And old age is in a hurry. He goes home content
Drags one leg after the other
His old bones squeak painfully
Because it's a long way home.

Lyrics_tekstovinet:
Soto voce piva klapa 
u to gluvo litnje doba 
i prolazi ispod skala 
di se susi tvoja roba 

Do pergula rici lete 
pun se misec smije gradu 
ti se dizes iz kocete 
da poslusas serenadu 
 
Ref.
S ponistre se vidi Solta
piva klapa ispo' volta 
u daljini svitle koce 
piva klapa soto voce 

Ti se ozires po sobi 
slika je na kantunalu 
oneg ca ga more odni 
u daleken fortunalu 

Opustila davno riva 
zatvoreni su portuni 
ispo' volta klapa piva 
tvoji mirisu lancuni 

Tihu razmices koltrinu 
zrila si ka litnje vece 
o jubavi i o vinu 
piva klapa soto voce 

Ref.

Niko nece te kastigat' 
kad bi skinila korotu 
zalost' ce te svu destrigat' 
a jos mores dat' lipotu 

S ponistre se vidi Solta 
zmiga svitlo ispo' volta 
u po' bota kada pasa 
piva klapa ispo' glasa
EngTitle_lyricstranslate: The Klapa Is Singing Under The Vault
Lyrics_lyricstranslate:
Šoto voče piva klapa u to gluvo litnje doba
I prolazi ispod skala di se suši tvoja roba.
Do pergula riči lete, pun se Misec smije gradu,
Ti se dižeš iz kočete da poslušaš serenadu.. S ponistre se vidi Šolta, piva klapa ispo' volta
U daljini svitle koće, piva klapa šoto voče
Ti se ozireš po sobi, slika je na kantunalu
Oneg ča ga more odni u daleken fortunalu. Opustila davno riva, zatvoreni su portuni
Ispo' volta klapa piva, tvoji mirišu lancuni
Tihu razmičeš koltrinu, zrila si ka litnje veče
O jubavi i o vinu piva klapa šoto voče. S ponistre se vidi Šolta, piva klapa ispo' volta
U daljini svitle koće, piva klapa šoto voče
Ti se ozireš po sobi slika je na kantunalu
Oneg ča ga more odni u daleken fortunalu. Niko neće te kaštigat kad bi skinila korotu
Žalost će te svu deštrigat a još moreš dat' lipotu
S ponistre se vidi Šolta, žmiga svitlo ispo' volta
U po' dota kada pasa piva klapa ispo' glasa
EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
The klapa is singing sotto voce in the wee summer night hours
And passes under the stairs where your laundry is hanging
Words are flying towards the pergola balcony
The full Moon is smiling to the city
You're rising from your bed to listen to the serenade. From your window you can see Šolta
The klapa is singing under the vault
Far out the fishing boats have lit their lamps,
The klapa is singing sotto voce
You're looking around the room, the photo is on the night stand
Of the one taken by the sea in a faraway stormy wind. The port has become deserted, all the city gates have been shut.
The klapa is singing under the vault, your bed sheets smell good
You're quietly opening the curtains, you're ripe as summer fruit
About love and wine the klapa is singing 'under the voice'. From your window you can see Šolta
The klapa is singing under the vault
Far out you can see the lights of the fishing boats,
The klapa is singing sotto voce. Nobody will castigate you if you stop wearing your black mourning clothes
Why would mourning make you all wrinkled when you can still show off beauty.. From your window you can see Šolta
The light is blinking under the vault
When passing the midpoint under the vault
The klapa is singing 'under the voice'

Piken kom med en bønn til det blå havet,

Hennes hjerte var som en vissen rose,
Det klarte ikke mer uten ham.. Ref. x4

EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
All the beautiful things which we learn
So they would last with us and live with us
I learned as a child in your house
Still standing white in the middle of the coastwalk. Timidly, beside the piano, I was
Watching like many bedazzled with your fingers
And you didn't know, harsh as you were,
That all the strings inside me are trembling too. Second floor, next to the port
Music still lasts like a butterfly's flight
As I looked at your white hands -.
Was I listening to the heart or the sound of the piano?. Next to a silent lamp, your voice was
A mistery to me, the glow of the yellow velvet
Like the drops of the morning in a bright waterfall
Like mild September in the shadow of rains. I still remember the piano against the wall
And the vintage air on the porcelain

that beautiful child I want

Lyrics_lyricstranslate:
Rasuja san pustu radost
tu na žalu tvojih vala,

da me nešto sebi zove

EngTitle_lyricstranslate: I know that You Love Me
Lyrics_lyricstranslate:
Znam da si bila i ostala dijete,
što svaku igru neozbiljno shvaća.
Životi nisu ptice, koje lete,
naša su krila mnogo, mnogo kraća.. Pružam ti spokoj ove tople sobe,
i ljubav svoju i sve svoje dane.
Drugi te puti nikuda ne vode,
kud god da kreneš ti ćeš dobit manje.. Kad budeš tužna i kad budeš sama,
navrati k meni, uvijek ćeš me naći.
Znam da me voliš, kao prvog dana,
al’ tvoj je nemir od ljubavi jači.. Proći će vrijeme naglih putovanja,
stišat će strasti, kao morska pjena.
Ne budi dijete koje samo sanja,
malo se toga u životu mijenja.. Postoji slika jedne tihe luke,
i jedno sunce i komadić neba.
Kad god da dođeš, čekat će te ruke,
tople i nježne, stvarnije od svega.
EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
I know that you were and always a child,
who understood every frivolous game.
Lives are not birds who fly,
our wings are much, much shorter.. I offer you my serenity across this warm room,
and my love and days.
Other paths lead you nowhere,
wherever you go, you'll get less.. When you become sad and when you become alone,
come back to me, you'll always find me.
I know that you love me, like the first day,
but your distress is stronger than love.. The rushed trips will pass,
they will calm the passion, like the sea foam.
Don't be a child, who just dreams,
stuff like that doesn't really change in life.. There is a picture of one quiet harbour
and one sun and a piece of the sky.
Whenever you come, my hands will wait for you,
soft and gentle, more real than anything else.
